pullrequest.title: Adding WheelSlipPlugin: for adding wheel slip using ODE's contact parameters

content.raw:
I'm writing up a response to this as a comment in the code

While writing this response to this, it occurs to me that the joint velocity is measured relative to the parent, but I think the speed should be computed from the angular velocity of the child link relative to the world frame. I'll have an updated comment soon.
content.html:
I'm writing up a response to this as a comment in the code

While writing this response to this, it occurs to me that the joint velocity is measured relative to the parent, but I think the speed should be computed from the angular velocity of the child link relative to the world frame. I'll have an updated comment soon.
